sources.title: Jungle Girl (1941) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Frances Gifford, Tom Neal, Trevor Bardette
Writer: Edgar Rice Burroughs (novel by)
Directors:  John English & William Witney

In this thrilling Cliffhanger from Universal Pictures, Nyoka, the courageous Jungle Girl, faces treacherous villains, dangerous wildlife, and mysterious tribes deep in the heart of Africa. 
üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:07     CHAPTER 1:  Death by Voodoo
29:09     CHAPTER 2:  Queen of Beasts
46:48     CHAPTER 3:  River of Fire
1:04:04  CHAPTER 4:  Treachery
1:21:18  CHAPTER 5:  Jungle Vengeance
1:38:38  CHAPTER 6:  Tribal Fury
1:55:58  CHAPTER 7:  The Poison Dart
2:13:11  CHAPTER 8:  Man Trap
2:30:34  CHAPTER 9:  Treasure Tomb
2:47:51  CHAPTER 10: Jungle Killer 
3:05:52  CHAPTER 11: Dangerous Secret 
3:22:49  CHAPTER 12: Trapped
3:40:05  CHAPTER 13: Ambush
3:57:19  CHAPTER 14: Diamond Trail
4:14:43  CHAPTER 15: Flight to Freedom
4:32:39  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Dr. John Meredith has been driven from civilization by the criminal activities of his twin brother Bradley Meredith. With his infant daughter, he settles in the African jungle, where his ability to cure the native ills has resulted in his virtual control of the Masamba tribes, who possess vast diamond mines coveted by a gang of crooks. They use Shamba, a witch doctor jealous of Dr. Meredith's influence over the tribe, to further their schemes. They lure Dr. Meredith away from the jungle, and he is murdered by "Slick" Latimer. The natives believe that a sacred amulet is the secret of Dr. Meredith's power, and Shamba attempts to kill Nyoka, Meredith's now-grown-up daughter, to obtain the amulet (which actually contains the secret to the entrance of the Caves of Nakros). Jack Stanton rescues her and assists her in her efforts to recover the amulet. Latimer works with Shamba, and with Bradley Meredith, who poses as his murdered-brother so successfully that even Nyoka does not realize the deception.
metadata.Writer: Ronald Davidson, Norman S. Hall, William Lively
metadata.Actors: Frances Gifford, Tom Neal, Trevor Bardette
